# genderedstreetnames

The goal of `genderedstreetnames` is to automatically find the gender of street names, manually fix what the automatic part got wrong.

This is a work in progress, more details soon. 

## Installation

This package is currently available on GitHub. 


``` r
remotes::install_github("giocomai/genderedstreetnames")
```
